00020 
00021 #ifndef CO_EXCEPTION_H
00022 #define CO_EXCEPTION_H
00023 
00024 #include <exception> // base class
00025 #include <iostream>
00026 #include <lunchbox/compiler.h>
00027 #include <lunchbox/types.h>
00028 
00029 namespace co
00030 {
00031     class Exception;
00032     std::ostream& operator << ( std::ostream& os, const Exception& e );
00033 
00035     class Exception : public std::exception
00036     {
00037     public:
00039         enum Type
00040         {
00041             TIMEOUT_WRITE,   
00042             TIMEOUT_READ,    
00043             TIMEOUT_BARRIER, 
00044             TIMEOUT_COMMANDQUEUE, 
00045             CUSTOM      = 20 
00046         };
00047 
00049         Exception( const uint32_t type ) : _type( type ) {}
00050 
00052         virtual ~Exception() throw() {}
00053 
00055         virtual uint32_t getType() const { return _type; }
00056 
00058         const char* what() const throw() override
00059         {
00060             switch( _type )
00061             {
00062               case Exception::TIMEOUT_WRITE:
00063                   return " Timeout on write operation";
00064               case Exception::TIMEOUT_READ:
00065                   return " Timeout on read operation";
00066               case Exception::TIMEOUT_BARRIER:
00067                   return " Timeout on barrier";
00068               case Exception::TIMEOUT_COMMANDQUEUE:
00069                   return " Timeout on command queue";
00070               default:
00071                   return  " Unknown Exception";
00072             }
00073         }
00074 
00075     private:
00077         const uint32_t _type;
00078     };
00079 
00081     inline std::ostream& operator << ( std::ostream& os, const Exception& e )
00082         { return os << e.what(); }
00083 }
00084 
00085 #endif // CO_EXCEPTION_H
